## AuthorizationDeniedError class

Thrown when the user explicitly denies an authorization request for a secret access operation (e.g. cancels an OS permission dialog).

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class AuthorizationDeniedError extends VaultError 
```
**Extends:** [VaultError](./vaultkeeper.vaulterror.md)
